languages.text: "Биться, эттфатер. Я буду искать достойную схватку и повергать врагов Всеотца, пока однажды не найдется достойный сразить меня. Имя Зловещего воя будет плыть, словно дреккар, в реках пролитой мной крови нечестивцев. Черногрив более не мой покровитель, отныне я пойду тропами Локъяра, Одинокого Волка".

"Fight, Aett-Vater. I will seek honourable combat and vanquish the Allfather's enemies until the day there is none worthy of defeating me. The name of the Baleful Howl will sail like a drekkar along the rivers of unholy blood that I will spill. Blackmane is no longer my patron — from this day I tread the paths of Lokyar, the Lone Wolf."
languages.original_text: "Биться, эттфатер. Я буду искать достойную схватку и повергать врагов Всеотца, пока однажды не найдется достойный сразить меня. Имя Зловещего воя будет плыть, словно дреккар, в реках пролитой мной крови нечестивцев. Черногрив более не мой покровитель, отныне я пойду тропами Локъяра, Одинокого Волка".

The name of the Famehungry will sail like a drekkar along the rivers of unholy blood that I will spill. The Blackmane is no longer my patron — from this day I tread the paths of Lokyar, the Lone Wolf."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Fight, Aett-Vater. I will seek honourable combat and vanquish the Allfather's enemies until the day there is none worthy of defeating me. The name of the Baleful Howl will sail like a drekkar along the rivers of unholy blood that I will spill. Blackmane is no longer my patron — from this day I tread the paths of Lokyar, the Lone Wolf."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Luchar, Aett-Vater. Buscaré un combate honorable y exterminaré a los enemigos del Padre de todas las cosas hasta que no quede ninguno digno de derrotarme. El nombre del Aullido Torvo navegará como un drekkar por los ríos de sangre impía que derramaré. Melenanegra ya no es mi patrón: de ahora en adelante sigo la senda de Lokyar, el Lobo Solitario».
languages.original_text: "Fight, Aett-Vater. I will seek honourable combat and vanquish the Allfather's enemies until the day there is none worthy of defeating me. The name of the Baleful Howl will sail like a drekkar along the rivers of unholy blood that I will spill. Blackmane is no longer my patron — from this day I tread the paths of Lokyar, the Lone Wolf."

traits.locale_text: «Luchar, Aett-Vater. Buscaré un combate honorable y exterminaré a los enemigos del Padre de todas las cosas hasta que no quede ninguno digno de derrotarme. El nombre de los Hambrientos de fama navegará como un drekkar por los ríos de sangre impía que derramaré. Melenanegra ya no es mi patrón: de ahora en adelante sigo la senda de Lokyar, el Lobo Solitario».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我要战斗，狼领。我将寻求光荣的战斗，征服全父的敌人，直到战胜所有值得一战的敌人。怒嚎者之名将像撞角长船一样，沿着我所洒下的不洁血河航行。黑鬃不再是我的守护神，从今天起，我将踏上孤狼洛卡亚的道路。”
languages.original_text: "Fight, Aett-Vater. I will seek honourable combat and vanquish the Allfather's enemies until the day there is none worthy of defeating me. The name of the Baleful Howl will sail like a drekkar along the rivers of unholy blood that I will spill. Blackmane is no longer my patron — from this day I tread the paths of Lokyar, the Lone Wolf."

traits.locale_text: “我要战斗，狼领。我将寻求光荣的战斗，征服全父的敌人，直到战胜所有值得一战的敌人。渴名者之名将像撞角长船一样，沿着我所洒下的不洁血河航行。黑鬃不再是我的守护神，从今天起，我将踏上孤狼洛卡亚的道路。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「戦うよ、アエット＝ヴァテル。俺は名誉ある戦いを求め、俺を倒すに値せぬ者がひとりもいなくなるその日まで、全知の父の敵を殺し続けるつもりだ。『破滅の咆哮』の名は、俺が流す不浄な血の川に沿うドレッカールのように流れるだろう。ブラックメインはもはや俺の後援者ではない。この日から俺は一匹狼のロキアルの道を歩むことにする」
languages.original_text: "Fight, Aett-Vater. I will seek honourable combat and vanquish the Allfather's enemies until the day there is none worthy of defeating me. The name of the Baleful Howl will sail like a drekkar along the rivers of unholy blood that I will spill. Blackmane is no longer my patron — from this day I tread the paths of Lokyar, the Lone Wolf."

traits.locale_text: 「戦うよ、アエット＝ヴァテル。俺は名誉ある戦いを求め、俺を倒すに値せぬ者がひとりもいなくなるその日まで、全知の父の敵を殺し続けるつもりだ。『破滅の咆哮』の名は、俺が流す不浄な血の川に沿うドレッカールのように流れるだろう。ブラックメインはもはや俺の後援者ではない。この日から俺は一匹狼のロキアルの道を歩むことにする」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Poursuivre la lutte, aett-vater. Je me battrai dans l'honneur et je terrasserai les ennemis du Père de Tous jusqu'au jour où je ne trouverai plus d'adversaires à ma mesure. Le nom des Hurleurs sanguinaires voguera tel un drekkar sur les flots de sang impie que je verserai. J'ai fini de servir la Crinière Noire ; à compter d'aujourd'hui, je suivrai les voies de Lokyar, le Loup solitaire. »
languages.original_text: "Fight, Aett-Vater. I will seek honourable combat and vanquish the Allfather's enemies until the day there is none worthy of defeating me. The name of the Baleful Howl will sail like a drekkar along the rivers of unholy blood that I will spill. Blackmane is no longer my patron — from this day I tread the paths of Lokyar, the Lone Wolf."

traits.locale_text: « Poursuivre la lutte, aett-vater. Je me battrai dans l'honneur et je terrasserai les ennemis du Père de Tous jusqu'au jour où je ne trouverai plus d'adversaires à ma taille. Le nom des Dévoreurs de gloire voguera tel un drekkar sur les flots de sang impie que je verserai. J'ai fini de servir la Crinière Noire ; à compter d'aujourd'hui, je suivrai les voies de Lokyar, le Loup solitaire. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Kämpft, Aett-Vater. Ich werde den ehrenwerten Kampf suchen und die Feinde des Allvaters besiegen, bis es niemanden mehr gibt, der würdig ist, mich zu besiegen. Der Name der Baleful Howl wird wie ein Drekkar auf dem Fluss aus dem unheiligem Blut entlangsegeln, das ich vergieße. Die Schwarzmähne ist nicht länger mein Patron — von diesem Tag an beschreite ich die Pfade von Lokyar, dem Einsamen Wolf."
languages.original_text: "Fight, Aett-Vater. I will seek honourable combat and vanquish the Allfather's enemies until the day there is none worthy of defeating me. The name of the Baleful Howl will sail like a drekkar along the rivers of unholy blood that I will spill. Blackmane is no longer my patron — from this day I tread the paths of Lokyar, the Lone Wolf."

traits.locale_text: "Kämpft, Aett-Vater. Ich werde den ehrenwerten Kampf suchen und die Feinde des Allvaters besiegen, bis es niemanden mehr gibt, der würdig ist, mich zu besiegen. Der Name der Famehungry wird wie ein Drekkar auf dem Fluss aus dem unheiligem Blut entlangsegeln, das ich vergieße. Die Schwarzmähne ist nicht länger mein Patron — von diesem Tag an beschreite ich die Pfade von Lokyar, dem Einsamen Wolf."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Fight, Aett-Vater. I will seek honourable combat and vanquish the Allfather's enemies until the day there is none worthy of defeating me. The name of the Baleful Howl will sail like a drekkar along the rivers of unholy blood that I will spill. Blackmane is no longer my patron — from this day I tread the paths of Lokyar, the Lone Wolf."

languages.text: "Savaş, Aett-Vater. Beni yenmeye layık kimsenin kalmadığı güne dek onurlu çatışma arayışında olacak ve Yücebaba'nın düşmanlarını bertaraf edeceğim. Uğursuz Uluma'nın adı, döktüğüm uğursuz kanların aktığı nehirlerde drekkar gibi süzülecek. Karayele artık efendim değildir. Bugünden itibaren Yalnız Kurt Lokyar'ın yolunda yürüyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Fight, Aett-Vater. I will seek honourable combat and vanquish the Allfather's enemies until the day there is none worthy of defeating me. The name of the Baleful Howl will sail like a drekkar along the rivers of unholy blood that I will spill. Blackmane is no longer my patron — from this day I tread the paths of Lokyar, the Lone Wolf."

traits.locale_text: "Savaş, Aett-Vater. Beni yenmeye layık kimsenin kalmadığı güne dek onurlu bir çatışmayı arayacağım ve Yücebaba'nın düşmanlarını bertaraf edeceğim. Uğursuz Uluma'nın adı, döktüğüm uğursuz kanlardan oluşan nehirlerde drekkar gibi süzülecek. Karayele artık efendim değildir. Bugünden itibaren Yalnız Kurt Lokyar'ın yolunda yürüyeceğim."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
